mapper.select: SELECT m.`memberId` as memberId, l.`loginId` AS loginId, m.`name` AS name, m.`phone` AS tel, m.`email` AS email, m.`nickname` AS nickname, m.`status` AS status, m.profileUrl AS profileUrl FROM `loginInfo` l, `member` m WHERE m.memberId = l.member_id AND m.memberId = #{memberId} AND m.status = "Y"

SELECT A.orderId, A.orderDate AS 'orderDate', A.status AS 'status', E.name AS 'storeName', A.phone AS 'phone', C.name AS 'foodName', B.quantity AS 'quantity', B.order_id, D.name AS 'image', D.orgName AS 'orgName' FROM `order` A INNER JOIN `orderInfo` B INNER JOIN `food` C INNER JOIN `store_file` D INNER JOIN `store` E ON A.orderId = B.orderInfoId AND B.food_id = C.foodId AND C.store_id = D.store_id AND C.store_id = E.storeId
WHERE A.status != 'S' AND A.member_id= #{memberId}

SELECT A.couponNumber, A.couponName, B.coupon_used AS 'couponUsed', A.couponEnd, B.total_discountPrice, A.status, f.store_id FROM `coupon` A, `member_coupon` B, food f WHERE A.couponId = B.coupon_id AND A.food_id = f.foodId AND B.coupon_holder = #{memberId}

SELECT r.reviewId ,r.regDate ,r.updateDate ,r.status ,r.score ,r.body ,r.store_id ,r.foodPhoto ,r.reply ,r.writerid ,m.nickname ,s.name FROM review r, `member` m, `store` s WHERE r.writerid = m.memberId AND r.store_id = s.storeId AND r.writerid = #{memberId} AND r.status != 'N'
